name: One Clip
description:
A Roguelike game Built for Speedrunning, the catch is that you only have 1 magazine. To manage this you can throw your gun away and pick up a new one from the floor fully loaded.
Your only objective is to get to the end zone as fast as possible.

This is a short and simple experience with randomly generated maps.

Controls

- WASD to move

- Left Click a gun on the floor without any gun equipped to pick it up

- Left Click with a gun equipped to shoot
(if you run out of ammo just throw it away and pick up a new one)

- Press Q to throw gun (Thrown guns will instantly kill enemies)

- Press Space to dash (Dashes reset when an enemy is killed)

- ESC to pause

Made by

Emeep - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGHbPdW3y-rl9YZP9tUFQpg

Music by - Panzerman/HornyHunter  - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQtTczWokq1tTskOUBmE8mg
